sentences.sentence: It is a proposition deducible from basic postulates.
sentences.translation: 这是个从基本公设推论出的命题。

sentences.sentence: It is deducible from the fact.
sentences.translation: 那件事可从该项事实中推断出。

sentences.sentence: This definition of the beautiful is deducible from the foregoing definition of it as an object of delight apart from any interest.
sentences.translation: 对美的这一说明可以从上面关于美是不涉及任何利害的愉悦的对象的说明中导出。
